title: The rise of autonomous IT: LogicMonitor on what the move to AI-first observability really means
description: In a year defined by AI breakthroughs and cloud transformation, LogicMonitor Inc. used the AWS re:Invent stage to announce its acquisition of Catchpoint Systems Inc. The move marks a turning point for AI-first observability in the mainstream, according to the…
